name: Time drifter (itch)
description:
Team: 
Sebastián Medina
Fabian Tobar 
Diana Díaz   
Description
Have you ever made bad decisions? Have you wanted to change something from your past? Maybe there is an opportunity to live that experience. With Timedrifter you can take risks, and if you do something that didn't work out so well, press the button, go back in time and make a better decision.

Game design document
